CustomField.description: This field is updated automatically by a workflow rule. It is set to the last day of the month that occurs after the Distribution Date. It is used by a time-dependent workflow rule to check the "Locked" check box.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is updated automatically by a workflow rule. It is set to the last day of the month that occurs after the Distribution Date. It is used by a time-dependent workflow rule to check the "Locked" check box 1 day after this date
CustomField.label: Lock Date
